snippet: The officials were arrested on charges of overloading the ship with cargo, a senior prosecutor said on Tuesday.
abstract: Four officials of Cheonghaejin Marine Company, operator of South Korean ferry that sank on April 16, are arrested on charges of overloading the ship with cargo; face criminal charges, including accidental homicide.
lead_paragraph: The officials were arrested on charges of overloading the ship with cargo, a senior prosecutor said on Tuesday.

headline.main: 4 Employed by Operator of Doomed South Korean Ferry Are Arrested
headline.print_headline: 4 Officials of South Korean Ferry’s Operator Are Arrested
